trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a pop-up window that displays information for an element in the interface.
trans-unit.target: 表示创建一个弹出窗口，在界面中显示元素的相关信息的控件。

trans-unit.source: A ToolTip is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: 工具提示是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: You use a ToolTip control to provide information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示控件用于向用户提供信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use a ToolTip to provide the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用工具提示提供<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>的名称

trans-unit.source: The content of a ToolTip control can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that has embedded text and images.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示控件的内容可以不同而有所不同的简单文本字符串到更复杂的内容如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>具有嵌入文本和图像。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: The content of a ToolTip cannot receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示的内容不能接收焦点。

trans-unit.source: A ToolTip control cannot have a parent.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示控件不能具有父项。

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> to a ToolTip Instead, assign a ToolTip to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你不能设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>到工具提示相反，将分配到的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use a ToolTip on multiple elements by defining a ToolTip in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过定义工具提示中<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>对多个元素中使用工具提示

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ToolTip class are used to define the position and behavior of the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示类的属性用于定义的位置和工具提示的行为。

trans-unit.source: Many of these properties are also defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class.
trans-unit.target: 其中的许多属性还定义中的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>

trans-unit.source: If the value of one of these properties is specified by both the ToolTip property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>attached property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个工具提示属性指定的其中一个属性的值与<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>的附加属性的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>使用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> class provides properties to set timing behavior.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>类提供了用于设置计时行为的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>

trans-unit.source: These attached properties are not included in the ToolTip class but can be used by the control.
trans-unit.target: 这些附加的属性不包含在工具提示类，但可以使用由该控件。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ToolTip Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ToolTip controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义工具提示控件到适用于多个工具提示控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ToolTip, see [ToolTip Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于工具提示的状态，请参阅[工具提示样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ToolTip control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在工具提示控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> is closed and is no longer visible.
trans-unit.target: 发生时<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>已关闭，并且不再可见。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> event is also raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> control is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>事件也是时引发<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>控件已关闭。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delegate handler method to use to position the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于放置的处理程序方法的委托<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>属性必须设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>为要使用的回调委托。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>委托返回的可能的点方面<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>定义数组</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>是显示，选中了一点来最大化量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>是可见的窗口。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback"> </xref>委托提供位置信息的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has a drop shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否有阴影。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>打开时，值设置为<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`true`如果不起作用<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has a drop shadow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控件具有投影，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HasDropShadow*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HasDropShadow*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标原点和弹出项对齐的水平距离点。

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>，HorizontalOffset，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性的行为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一样

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目标原点 popup 对齐点之间的水平距离。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关目标原点和弹出项对齐点的信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.target: 事件信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control when it opens, and specifies how the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control behaves when it overlaps screen boundaries.

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, Placement, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.

trans-unit.target: 这些属性的行为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一样

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode"></xref> enumeration value that determines the orientation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control when it opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode"> </xref>枚举值，该值确定的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>控制时将它打开，并且，它指定控件与屏幕边界交互的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangular area relative to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相对于其的矩形区域<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>控件位于在打开时。

trans-unit.source: You can position <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, PlacementRectangle, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>，PlacementRectangle， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性的行为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一样

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>。</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the PlacementTarget, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is the logical parent of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>的逻辑父级的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an open <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> remains open until the user clicks the mouse when the mouse is not over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已打开<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>保持打开状态直到用户单击鼠标时鼠标不超过<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value of `false` for the StaysOpen property is not supported for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> when it is not open.
trans-unit.target: 值为`false`对于 StaysOpen 属性不支持的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>时未打开。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To create a tooltip that stays open until the mouse button is pressed when it is outside the tooltip, you must set both the StaysOpen property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.IsOpen%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建外部工具提示时按下鼠标按钮前保持打开状态的工具提示，则必须设置这两个 StaysOpen 属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.IsOpen%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.IsOpen%2A>

trans-unit.source: If StaysOpen is set to `false` when the tooltip is not open, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 StaysOpen 设置为`false`时未打开，工具提示<xref:System.NotSupportedException>发生。</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> stays open until it is closed by the user clicking the mouse button outside the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>始终处于打开状态，直到用户单击鼠标按钮之外关闭<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when StaysOpen is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when a tooltip is not open.
trans-unit.target: StaysOpen 设置为出现<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>工具提示未打开。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.StaysOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标原点和弹出项对齐之间的垂直距离点。

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定位<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性的行为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一样

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md)。
